name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IMDB Movie rating lookup for Netflix

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IMDB Movie rating and youtube trailer lookup for Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever tired of changing tabs in browser to know IMDB rating of a movie and then watch its trailer on YouTube. Sounds like a lot of waste of time.

This extension brings you all these features right into Netflix. Just hover on the movie you want to watch and you'll see a popup coming over with IMDB rating and its trailer on YouTube. 

Please rate and comment, if you find it useful.
Also suggestions are welcomed.

Permissions:
No private information is being used.
